name: Mico Fly
description:
Transform into a bird and race through vibrant worlds of floating islands in the sky. Race in this brand new adventure.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Enter - Restart
  • Escape - Pause
  • Left Shift - Boost

Made With Unreal Engine 4

Game Made By:

  • Raquel Marcelino  https://raquelvenancio.itch.io/
  • João Salgado https://joao-salgado.itch.io/
